author: SuperCarlinBrothers
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp - go to http://betterhelp.com/super to get 10% off your first month.

What if one of Newt Scamander’s own children has been hiding in plain sight this whole time?! In today’s theory, we dive deep into the Fantastic Beasts lore, trace the Scamander family tree, and uncover how a familiar face from Privet Drive might secretly be Newt’s long-lost daughter. 👀  
From Kneazles to Crookshanks, from Dumbledore’s “old crowd” to Luna Lovegood’s marriage, the dots line up surprisingly well.

#harrypotter #SuperCarlinBrother
